revision.text:
{{Infobox battle item |name = xAttack |image = [[File:Bag_X_Attack_Sprite.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''xAttack''. |price = 600 |location = Viridian City }} The '''xAttack''' is a type of battle item. It temporarily boosts the player's Pokemon's Attack for 60 seconds. ==Details== ===Description=== Double your Pokemon attack for 60 seconds! ===Acquisition=== X Attack can be purchased at the Cerulean City Shop for 3000 coins. {{ItemPrice/head‎|Battle items}} |} |} == Trivia == {{Battle items}}
[[Category:Items]]
